question: Doldrums pressure belts lies in between which of the following latitudes?
explanation: Equatorial Low Pressure Belt or 'Doldrums' Lies between 10°N and 10°S latitudes. Width may vary between 5°N and 5°S and 20°N and 20°S. This belt happens to be the zone of convergence of trade winds from two hemispheres from sub-tropical high pressure belts.
